title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Upper Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Upper Shelf
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, along lower center edge: 75. / Black Walnut; along left edge of image and inside upper left and center of image, numerical notations
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular top having two drawers at front, raised on 4 straight tapering legs; lower shelf half way up from floor level; upper shelf supported by raised backsplash and 2 columnar supports at front.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Drawers and Upper Shelf, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-66
